Class JCoincheBid

  • java.lang.Object
    • JCoincheBid

  • public class JCoincheBid
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is used to handle the game bid. It will define the BidInformation needed for one round. It implements the method runBid() which will generate the BidInformation.
    See Also:
    GameThread

      • runBid

        public void runBid()
